para.style: text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:9px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.46; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text.style: font-family:Verdana; font-size:10pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

para.text: Exporting a binary package is very straightforward. Simply select the appropriate package in the

text.style: font-family:Verdana; font-size:10pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

para.text: from the context menu or the

text.style: font-family:Verdana; font-size:10pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

para.text: menu. You will be confronted with a prompter asking you to choose an appropriate digital certificate for signing the exported package.

para.style: text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:14px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.46; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:14px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.46; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text.style: font-family:Verdana; font-size:10pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

para.text: The displayed list of certificates contains all of the
certificates that are installed into your #

text.style: font-family:Verdana; font-size:10pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

para.text: and installing it onto your system.

para.style: text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:14px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.46; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text.style: font-family:Verdana; font-size:10pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

para.text: If you don't have any certificates available, the list will be empty and you should choose

text.style: font-family:Verdana; font-size:10pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

para.text: to continue without signing your package. Similarly, if you wish to leave the package unsigned you can click

text.style: font-family:Verdana; font-size:10pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

para.text: and the export process will continue without applying a digital signature.

para.style: text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:14px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.46; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text.style: font-family:Verdana; font-size:10pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

para.text: If you choose a certificate for signing then you will also be prompted for the private key associated with that certificate. This is only used as part of the signature generation process and is not included in the signed package at all.

para.style: text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:14px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.46; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text.style: font-family:Verdana; font-size:10pt; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; text-decoration:none; text-transform:none; vertical-align:baseline; color:#000000; background-color:transparent; letter-spacing:normal; letter-scaling:100%;

para.text: The end result will be that a new Binary Package file is created in the same directory, and with the same basic name, as the original source package. Binary Package files have a .PAK file type.

para.style: text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:14px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:14px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.46; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
